add-remove.title: Add/Remove
add-remove.description: Dynamically add and remove elements from the page
add-remove.information: As well as being able to dynamically add and remove elements from the page, you can also add `?initialElements=X` onto the url to generate elements on load.

check-box.title: Checkbox
check-box.description: A set of checkbox scenarios to test against.

drag-and-drop.title: Drag and Drop
drag-and-drop.description: Drag elements from one side of the page and drop them on the other side.
drag-and-drop.information: You able to drag an infinite amount of the red boxes and drop them on the grey box.

drag-and-drop-hard.title: Drag and Drop
drag-and-drop-hard.description: Drag the appropriate smaller shapes onto the larger shape.
drag-and-drop-hard.information: A correct drop will result in the shape turning green, otherwise the shape will turn yellow. Note: the shapes change on each reload

dynamic-table.title: Dynamic Table
dynamic-table.description: Find the data within the green bar within the table.
dynamic-table.information: Note: the table data refreshes on a reload.
dynamic-table.name: Name

file-upload.title: File Upload
file-upload.description: Using common browser components, upload a file.
file-upload.information: The upload can be anywhere between 1-10 seconds regardless of size as the upload function is mocked.

login-form.title: Login Form
login-form.description: A typical login form with username and password.
login-form.information: The username is 'admin' and the password is 'Passw0rd!'.
login-form.invalid-credentials: The credentials you have provided are invalid

notification.title: Notification
notification.description: Check alerts that are sent as a popup and also part of the main page.
notification.information: Click on any of the buttons to trigger a notification that is of that type. The popup stays visible for 6 seconds.

messages.success: This is a successful notification message
messages.info: This is an info notification message
messages.warning: This is a warning notification message
messages.error: This is an error notification message

radio-button.title: Radio Button
radio-button.description: A set of radio buttons to check against.
radio-button.information: Depending on the first radio button clicked, a second set will appear and change based on the first one clicked.

tooltip-page.title: Tooltips
tooltip-page.description: A set of tooltips to test against.
tooltip-page.information: Hover over the elements in this page to view the tooltips.
tooltip-page.no-permission: You don't have permission to do this
tooltip-page.really-long-text: A really really long text example

slider-page.title: Sliders
slider-page.description: A range of sliders for you to interact with.

various-inputs.title: Various Inputs
various-inputs.description: There are all the different types of HTML inputs this page with an output that can be used to verify
